mapper.select: SELECT stu.real_name AS name, stu.stu_number AS number, stu.phone, stu.id_card AS idCard, stu.gender, stu.nation, stu.email, stu.qq, stu.politic, cla.class_name AS classes, coll.coll_name AS college, img.url AS avatar FROM user_student AS stu INNER JOIN entity_college AS coll ON stu.college_id = coll.id INNER JOIN entity_classes AS cla ON stu.classes_id = cla.id LEFT JOIN resource_img AS img ON img.uuid = stu.avatar AND img.create_number = '${stuNumber}' WHERE stu.stu_number = #{stuNumber}
